products.description: Presenting the Porodo PD 20W UK Fast Charger / With C to Lightning Cable / With C to C Cable – Black – a practical, functional, and safe means of fast charging your gadgets. Rated voltage: 100-240V, 50/60Hz; this compact charger is excellent for home use and travel and offers universal compatibility with a wide range of devices. On the other hand, USB-C output supports fast charging options like 5V/3A, 9V/2.22A, and 12V/1.67A for 20W fast recharging. This charger will make sure that the job is quick and effective whether you’re powering up your smartphone, tablet, or other USB-C-enabled devices.

products.description: When you purchase the Green Lion charger and cable with a length of 1 meter, it stands out for its fast data transfer, allowing you to enjoy your tourist activities while ensuring constant connectivity. products.title: Green Lion OTG Adapter USB-A to USB-C – Gray
products.description: The Green Lion USB 2.0 Adapter Type-C/Lightning can offer reliable, fast, high-quality data transmission and is suitable for everything from laptops down to the latest smartphones and tablets. With up to 480Mbps transfer speed, this adapter allows smooth and efficient file transfers, which is great for on-the-go productivity and media sharing. This adapter is built to be used long-term and will resist wear and tear even with daily use with a zinc alloy shell design. Its solid build not only ensures durability but also a fine finish, shining with modern devices. It is widely compatible with many different devices, handling
